data.text: @SeaburyHelen @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Looks fantastic well done & thank you

@SeaburyHelen @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Powerful statements from children and young people with Long Covid. My 15 yo daughter, Eliana, is grateful to all who are listening and speaking out on her behalf. Thank you #LongCovidKids

@SeaburyHelen @LC_UK_Action @LongCovidKids @LCKScotland @long_covid Hi Helen - I'm looking to speak to people about their experiences of Long Covid for a feature I am writing, please follow me so I can send you a DM - thanks!
